---
category: news
title: "Bias free multiobjective active learning for materials design and discovery"
excerpt: "Identifying optimal materials in multiobjective optimization problems represents a challenge for new materials design approaches. Here the authors develop an active-learning algorithm to optimize the Pareto-optimal solutions successfully applied to the in silico polymer design for a dispersant-based application."
